name: GranvilleAreaChamberofCommerce
0:
”Alexa, open Granville Chamber”
”What time is the farmers market?”
”What is going on today?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: granville chamber
des:
Granville Area Chamber of Commerce's Alexa Skill provides the user with information on upcoming events. It can answer questions like: "What is going on Today?", "What is happening in Granville on August 6th?", "What time is the farmers market?", "Where is the Granville Art Walk?", and "How much is the Farmers Market?". It can will also provide the address and phone number of businesses that are members of The G.A.C.C.

Calendar Information:
• Find out what is happening on a specific day. 
 “What is going on today?”
 “What happening tomorrow?”
 “What is going on in Granville on August 2nd?” 
• Find out info on a specific event.
 “What is The Granville Fellowship Luncheon?”
 “Where is the Granville Art Walk?”
 “What time is the Board Meeting?”
 “When is the next Village Council meeting?
 “What is the cost of going to the Farmers Market?”

Business Information:
• “What is the address of JCC Hosting?”
• “What is the phone number of the Granville Area Chamber of Commerce?”

Take Suggestions for New Features:
• “Add a feature that will allow you to…” 

"List Commands" will give you a list of possible commands and examples.
"What is new?" will give you a quick update on recent features.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
